name: Extinctions
effect: In Extinction, You lose Everything. But, also come Everything. This process is of paramount importance in natural selection.

policies.name: Oceanic Anoxic Events
uniques: [-25]% Production when constructing [Fishes] units [in all cities]
[-50]% Production when constructing [Arthropod] units [in all cities]
[+20]% Production when constructing [Amphibian] units [in all cities]

policies.name: Hypoxic Environment
uniques: [-50]% Production when constructing [All] units [in all cities] <for [7] turns>

policies.name: Meteorite Impact
uniques: [-25]% Production when constructing [Reptile] units [in all cities] <for [30] turns>
[-20]% Production when constructing [Mammal] units [in all cities] <for [30] turns>

policies.name: Impact winter
uniques: [-50]% Production when constructing [Reptile] units [in all cities] <for [15] turns>

policies.name: Deccan Traps
uniques: [-50]% Production when constructing [Reptile] units [in all cities] <for [15] turns>

policies.name: Ice Age
uniques: [-30]% Production when constructing [Mammal] units [in all cities] <during the [Pleistocene]>

policies.name: Industrial Revolution
uniques: [-1 Food] from [Ocean] tiles [in all cities] <after discovering [Anthropocene]>
[-1 Production] from [GrassLand] tiles [in all cities] <after discovering [Anthropocene]>
[-1 Food] from [Forest] tiles [in all cities] <after discovering [Anthropocene]>

policies.name: Overfishing
uniques: [-30]% Production when constructing [Mammal] units [in all cities]
[+1 Food] from [Hunting Spot] tiles [in all cities]

policies.name: Extinctions Complete
policies.effect: +100% growth and +10 science in all cities

name: Tribalism
effect: +3 culture in capital and increased rate of border expansion

policies.name: Tribal Chief
policies.effect: +15% production when constructing wonders, +1 happiness for every 10 citizens in a city
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [Wonders] buildings [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness] per [10] population in all cities

policies.name: Festival
policies.effect: Immediately creates a cheapest available cultural building in each of your first 4 cities for free
uniques: Immediately creates a cheapest available cultural building in each of your first 4 cities for free

policies.name: Deffensive Warrior
policies.effect: Units in cities cost no Maintenance, garrisoned city +50% attacking strength
uniques: Units in cities cost no Maintenance

policies.name: Tribal Elders
policies.effect: +10% food growth and +2 food in capital

policies.name: Tribal Sciality
policies.effect: +1 gold and -1 unhappiness for every 2 citizens in capital
uniques: +1 gold and -1 unhappiness for every 2 citizens in capital

policies.name: Tribalism Complete
policies.effect: +15% growth and +2 food in all cities

name: Tradition
uniques: [-25]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]

policies.name: Aristocracy
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]

policies.name: Legalism
uniques: Provides the cheapest [Culture] building in your first [4] cities for free

policies.name: Oligarchy
uniques: Units in cities cost no Maintenance
[+50]% Strength for cities <with a garrison> <when attacking>

policies.name: Tradition Complete
uniques: Provides a [Cemetery] in your first [9] cities for free

policies.name: Republic
uniques: [+5]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in all cities]

policies.name: Representation
uniques: Each city founded increases culture cost of policies [33]% less than normal

policies.name: Meritocracy
uniques: [+1 Happiness] [in all cities connected to capital]

uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [Melee] units [in all cities]
